data.description:
`global` `{{social_media}}` array of all social-media site links for the storefront.

**Handlebars Expression** {{social_media}}

name.description: Internal name of this social-media platform (e.g., "googleplus")

url.description: URL to point to, set by merchant in control panel ([https://www.facebook.com/BigCommerce](https://www.facebook.com/BigCommerce), etc.)

position.description: Display sort order for this platform within the social-media list

display_name.description: Displayed/formatted name of this social-media platform (e.g., “Google+”)
